Algorithm.name: FlowToVolumeAlg
Algorithm.Comment:
Algorithm calculates volume using average interval flows
Properties:
PARTIAL_CALCULATIONS: true/false : use if a running volume is wanted
MIN_VALUES_REQUIRED: Number: the required number of records that must exist for calculation to succeed Value 0 means ALL interval observations must exist
MIN_VALUES_DESIRED: Number: will set flag field for result if # of inputs are <= this value
VALIDATION_FLAG: set the validation flag on output record
OBSERVATIONS_CALCULATION : true/false : use exact number of interval observations to calculate flow is only programmed to work for hourly and daily inputs!
FLOW_FACTOR: Number: use as multiplier for flow to volume factor (2.0,1.98) : Default: 86400/43560
